description: Tree works 5 day notification:  - T1 (Ash): 15 metres in height. 8 metres in width. Lateral limb over road at approximately 5 metres above ground level on stem is reduced due to visible decay on top of the limb. Situated in Grange Lane Fields on the boundary with Grange Lane. - T2 (Elm): 9 metres in height. Fell to ground level. All arising to be chipped  on site. The Trees are dead and are dangerous. Situated in the Grange Lane Fields on the boundary of Grange Lane. - T3 (Elm): 5 metres in height. Fell to ground level, the tree is dead and is dangerous. Situated in Grange Lane Fields on the boundary of Grange Lane.- G1 (Elm): All 8 metres in height. Fell all trees to ground level. All arisings to be chipped on site. Trees that are dead and are dangerous. Situated in Grange Lane Fields on the boundary of Grange Lane. - G2 (2x Elm): Both trees are 8 metres in height. Fell to ground level, all arisings to be chipped on site. Trees are dead and are dangerous. Situated in Grange Lane Fields on the boundary of Grange Lane.
site_name: Dulwich College Preparatory School Sports Ground
